name: github_bulk_scrape_repos
description: Scrape multiple GitHub repositories in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling github_scrape_repo multiple times. Pass repo URLs as a comma-separated string.

detailSteps.code: const pathParts = window.location.pathname.split('/').filter(Boolean); const owner = pathParts[0] || ''; const repoName = pathParts[1] || ''; const desc = document.querySelector('[itemprop="description"], .f4.my-3, p.f4')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const starsEl = document.querySelector('#repo-stars-counter-star, a[href$="/stargazers"] .Counter, a[href*="/stargazers"]'); const stars = starsEl ? starsEl.textContent.trim().replace(/[^\d.kKmM]/g, '') : ''; const forksEl = document.querySelector('#repo-network-counter, a[href$="/forks"] .Counter, a[href*="/forks"]'); const forks = forksEl ? forksEl.textContent.trim().replace(/[^\d.kKmM]/g, '') : ''; const langEl = document.querySelector('.BorderGrid-row .Progress-item, li.d-inline a[aria-label]'); const language = langEl ? langEl.getAttribute('aria-label') || '' : ''; return { name: owner + '/' + repoName, description: desc, stars: stars, forks: forks, language: language, url: window.location.href }
detailSteps.name: scrape_result
